replies.body:
Hey Swifty! Welcome to the server ^~^!
I'm going to tell you what to do before doing anything in the server.

You can make many type of posts here as there are a lot of sections, feel free to make a post where you want to tell us about something really important, a game, etc..

Also make sure to read the rules! This is the most important thing from the server! If you read the rules, then you'll be aware of the things you can and can't do while playing. (avicus.net/rules)

Now, the last thing I'm going to tell you is that you're free to join our TeamSpeak server and our PlugDJ where you'll me a lot of nice people, with that said, I wish you good luck and hope to see you in game! <3
TS and PlugDJ: ts.avicus.net/plug.dj/avicus
\o/

replies.body:
You've been quite spammy lately. If you wish to appeal, you must email support@avicus.net and do it there. Even after multiple warnings from staff members on separate posts, you seemed to disregard them and continue. You will be forum banned as well if you decide to carry on with your actions.

Regards, -Jake
